text: Tropicana Products is a multinational American company. It makes soft drinks. It was founded in 1947. The company was established in Florida, but the current headquarters are in Chicago. The company specializes in orange juice. It is owned by PepsiCo, which owns other food brands including Gatorade and Frito-Lay. Category:1947 establishments in the United States Category:PepsiCo brands Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:American drink companies
title: Tropicana Products
